segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and it’s making me so angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, doing nothing about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, and no one is stopping them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is going to tip, and someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how careless this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not even noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining the floor, and the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to yell at them all to pay attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
